author: vors
body:
### Repro

```
[system.manage<Tab>]
```
#### Expected

some type under `system.management` namespace
#### Actual

nothing, stays the same.
It gives the impression that there are no such types.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I think I know why this doesn't work. The type catalog cache that ends up being used to resolve these types for tab completion specifically does not include the PowerShell assemblies. This is something we could address with the Core PowerShell team.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
Linux UX sync agrees that this is a bug that needs to be fixed.

Given Andy's hunch, ping to @daxian-dbw

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: This issue is resolved via PR #1328

title: [system.manage<Tab>] doesn't work
